attributes.action: Disallow the DWP from changing criteria to massage the figures.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Are you genuinely sick/disabled and unfit for paid work? Are you sick of the way each elected government moves the goalposts of their criteria for allowing the genuine cases to be left to get on with their lives--if so then sign up to this petition and make yourself heard!!
